product_title: Good Waist High Waist Raw Hem Skinny Jeans
product_description: Designed to flatter every curve, these raw-hem skinny jeans are crafted with a gap-proof contoured waistband and a hint of stretch for a flawless fit.
product_details_and_care:
Designed to flatter every curve, these raw-hem skinny jeans are crafted with a gap-proof contoured waistband and a hint of stretch for a flawless fit.
28 1/2" inseam; 9 1/2" leg opening; 11 1/4" front rise; 15" back rise (size 8)
Zip fly with button closure
Five-pocket style
66% cotton, 21% polyester, 10% viscose, 3% elastane
Machine wash, tumble dry
